verses.roman:
na nūnaṁ kārtavīryasya
gatiṁ yāsyanti pārthivāḥ
yajña-dāna-tapo-yogaiḥ
śruta-vīrya-dayādibhiḥ

synonyms: na—not; nūnam—indeed; kārtavīryasya—of Emperor Kārtavīrya; gatim—the activities; yāsyanti—could understand or achieve; pārthivāḥ—everyone on the earth; yajña—sacrifices; dāna—charity; tapaḥ—austerities; yogaiḥ—mystic powers; śruta—education; vīrya—strength; dayā—mercy; ādibhiḥ—by all these qualities.
translation: No other king in this world could equal Kārtavīryārjuna in sacrifices, charity, austerity, mystic power, education, strength or mercy.
